name: miscarry
content:

to experience an early, unintentional end to a pregnancy: Sadly, she miscarried eight weeks into the pregnancy. She miscarried her first baby. See
miscarriage
More examplesFewer examplesHer friend had recently miscarried.She miscarried at 22 weeks.Up to 30% of pregnancies are miscarried.
